entry.tran: 生气勃勃的；活泼的；热烈的
entry.def: Someone who is animated or who is having an animated conversation is lively and is showing their feelings.

example.ex: She was seen in animated conversation with the singer Yuri Marusin...
example.tran: 有人看见她与歌手尤里·马鲁辛交谈甚欢。
每个人都变得更加活泼热情。

entry.def: An animated film is one in which puppets or drawings appear to move.

example.ex: Disney has returned to what it does best: making full-length animated feature films.
example.tran: 迪斯尼又回到了它最擅长的领域：制作动画长片。

means.word_mean: 1. having life or vigor or spirit;

sentences.sentence: "became very animated when he heard the good news"

means.word_mean: 2. made to appear to move as living creatures do;

auth_sentence.content: The animated and live characters are equally well drawn.

means.word_mean: 生气勃勃的；活跃的；热烈的

sentences.en: We had an animated discussion over current events last evening.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上我们热烈地讨论时事。

sentences.en: His observations gave rise to an animated and lively discussion.
sentences.cn: 他的言论引起了一场气氛热烈而活跃的讨论。

sentences.en: It was strange to see these Prague streets,usually so animated,now completely empty and deserted.
sentences.cn: 看到通常很有生气的布拉格的街道现在变得空无一人,真是很怪。
